location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.204 of 1858 (Political Department) from Captain Felix Jones, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Henry Lacon Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter relates to Residency income, and contains a list of financial penalties collected from various shaikhs and tribal leaders for infractions to the maritime peace, and credited to that monthâ€™s Residency accounts.
